      @GetMapping(path="/trips/{id}") public Trip getTripById​(@PathVariable int id)

      Parameters:
      id - id of the trip
      Returns:
      trip object

    • createTrip

      @PostMapping(path="/trips") public java.lang.String createTrip​(@RequestBody Trip trip)
      Creates a new trip
      Parameters:
      trip - trip object to be inserted into database
      Returns:
      success/fail message

    • updateTrip

      @PutMapping(path="/trips/{id}") public Trip updateTrip​(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody Trip request)
      Updates a trip with a new one
      Parameters:
      id - id of trip
      request - new trip to replace old one
      Returns:
      newly inserted trip

    • assignFlightToTrip

      @PutMapping(path="trips/{tripsId}/flights/{flightsId}") public java.lang.String assignFlightToTrip​(@PathVariable int tripsId, @PathVariable int flightsId)
      Assign a flight to a trip
      Parameters:
      tripsId - id of trip
      flightsId - id of flight
      Returns:
      success/fail message

      Assign a lodging to a trip
